meanings.definition: A woman who provides massage services.
meanings.sent1: The masseuses at the spa are very skilled at relieving muscle tension.
meanings.sent2: I booked an appointment with the masseuses for a relaxing massage.
meanings.sent3: The group of masseuses decided to have a massage party after work.
meanings.sent4: Her hands moved like the gentle touch of masseuses, soothing away stress.
meanings.sent5: The scent of lavender filled the room as the masseuses began their session.

meanings.sent1: We were greeted by a team of friendly masseuses at the wellness center.
meanings.sent2: The spa employs several masseuses to cater to their clients' needs.
meanings.sent3: The competition for the title of best masseuses in town was fierce.
meanings.sent4: The room buzzed with chatter as the masseuses prepared for their next appointments.
meanings.sent5: The masseuses' hands worked in harmony, creating a symphony of relaxation for their clients.
